contacts.name: Regin
contacts.signature: Do not contact for non-research funding matters

111410000.text: Hello? Hello? Any news? I'm getting antsy over here!!!

111410001.text: I know you're anxious about it, but hold on. The anomaly this time is in the projections of a movie projector. That's something new

111410002.text: It was hiding in the movie projector this time! I only realized it after seeing the projection! It was amazing!!! That's the news this time!

111410003.text: Whoa, you slow down yourself... You scared me!

111410004.text: The anomaly this time is kinda cute. I feel like I could package it a bit and use it for my dear sensor

111410005.text: You come back soon as well. If you have time, have a look at my research plan. If we get a new signal in the mean time, you can head out immediately
